title: Gettysburg National Military Park: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs         (NPS)  Park News is a service of the Public Affairs Office of Gettysburg National Military Park. Questions and/or comments should be addressed to the attention of:  Katie Lawhon Gettysburg National Military Park 1195 Baltimore Pike, Suite 100 Gettysburg, PA 17325 phone (717) 334-1124, ext. 3121 fax (717) 334-1891   e-mail: Public Affairs Specialist
